amendment.description: Amendment earmarks $60 million for assistance to Afghan women and girls and $5 million to the National Human Rights Commission of Afghanistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require $20 million of the Economic Support Fund to be used for programs for women and girls in Afghanistan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mrs. Maloney.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Maloney amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
